text: The Hunchback of Notre Dame is a 1939 RKO movie based on Victor Hugo's novel, directed by William Dieterle, and stars Charles Laughton and Maureen O'Sullivan. Category:1939 drama movies Category:1930s horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by William Dieterle
title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame (1939 movie)
